lead_paragraph: According to research published on Monday by the Centre for Management Buy-Out Research at Nottingham University, the share of private equity activity coming from what The Financial Times referred to as "pass-the-parcel" deals between private equity groups reached an all-time high in the first half of 2010.
snippet: According to research published Monday, the share of private equity activity coming from what the Financial Times refers to as "pass-the-parcel" deals between private equity hit an all-time high in the first half of 2010.
abstract: According to research published Monday, the share of private equity activity coming from what the Financial Times refers to as "pass-the-parcel" deals between private equity hit an all-time high in the first half of 2010.
